dentaai.title: DentaAI Assistant
dentaai.welcome: Hello! How can I assist you?
dentaai.error.unsupported.title: Browser Not Supported
dentaai.error.unsupported.message: The DentaAI voice assistant requires the Web Speech API, which is not supported by your current browser. Please try Chrome or Edge.
dentaai.error.permission: Microphone permission denied. Please allow microphone access in your browser settings to use the voice assistant.
dentaai.error.service_not_allowed: Speech recognition service is not available. This might be due to a network issue or browser policy. Please check your connection and try again.
dentaai.gesture.title: Gesture Navigation
dentaai.gesture.description: Use the buttons below to simulate hand gestures for app navigation. The camera feed helps position your hand.

dentafeed.noNewsMessage: The AI agent couldn't find any recent articles. Please try again later.

procedurepedia.chat.title: Ask a Follow-up Question
procedurepedia.chat.initial: Hi! I can answer any other questions you have about {procedureName}. What's on your mind?
procedurepedia.chat.error: Sorry, I'm having trouble responding right now. Please try again later.
procedurepedia.chat.placeholder: e.g., How long does it take?

oralscreen.title: OralScreen AI
oralscreen.sub: A more powerful suite of tools for oral health awareness and early detection.
oralscreen.analyzer.title: AI Lesion Analyzer
oralscreen.analyzer.sub: Upload or take a photo of a suspicious area in your mouth for a preliminary AI screening. This is NOT a medical diagnosis.
oralscreen.selfExam.title: Interactive Self-Exam Checklist
oralscreen.selfExam.sub: Follow these steps for a thorough self-examination. Check off each step as you go.
oralscreen.selfExam.warning: See a professional if you find any sore, patch, or lump that does not heal within two weeks.
oralscreen.knowledge.title: Knowledge & Risk Assessment
oralscreen.knowledge.risk.higher.advice: Your answers suggest a higher risk. It is highly recommended you speak to a dental professional about your risk factors and regular screenings.
oralscreen.knowledge.risk.moderate.advic: You have some risk factors. Consider discussing them with your dentist and adopting preventative measures.
oralscreen.knowledge.risk.lower.advice: You have fewer major risk factors. Continue to maintain a healthy lifestyle and have regular dental check-ups.
oralscreen.history.empty.title: No Screening History
oralscreen.history.empty.sub: Your saved analyses will appear here for tracking.
oralscreen.compare.new: Upload a new photo of the same area to compare.
oralscreen.compare.title: Comparison Analysis
oralscreen.compare.noChanges: No significant changes detected by the AI.
